tasks.task: Conducting a morning routine including various activities related to agriculture and homesteading.
subtasks: Going to bed early after dinner.
Practicing hunting skills (possibly for pest control or game).
Lighting a fire for warmth and preparation.
Cycling to a local lake as physical exercise.
Swimming naked (immersion in natural environment) for detoxification and health.
Dancing barefoot on the deck for movement and connection to the land.
Preparing and consuming fermented garlic pancake breakfast.
Fermenting garlic in raw honey for immune support (task includes preparation of jars, layering garlic and honey, and noting the fermentation process).
Making a fermented garlic paste (pasteurizing garlic with salt, processing with a food processor, and storing in a jar).
Labeling and storing fermented garlic products for later use.
Discussing the cultural and health significance of fermented foods, including their role in the gut-brain axis and traditional practices.
